description:
Space-efficient general purpose bottles with wide mouths for easy filling and cleaning.

  • Round shape makes for efficient storage of liquid
  • Patented, leakproof lid system
  • High density polyethylene (HDPE) construction is durable and can be boiled clean
  • HDPE is porous and retains tastes and odours – sensitive users may wish to use Tritan™ (co-polyester) bottles instead
name: Nalgene Wide-Mouth HDPE Water Bottle
